values:
me and katie were extremely high when we wrote this in the middle of uhhhh... fall  i think, lol... check it out,  its fuckin crazy

chokin on seashells and hearin the ocean in my ears/ im drowning, im drowning u fuckin left me here/ red appled peppers keeping time in the night/ i wanted to please you but i gave up the fight/ comfy orange pumpkins are reeling you in/ i wanted to please you but i gave up the win/ oh ghostly ghostly winter time show me your back cuz i can see your spine/ a traitor here nevermore nevermore/ broken and bruised left in pieces on the floor/ u sed you wernt kidding when you had to leave/ you catch like an angel you burn like a devil, show me whos boss


[steph bachman and katie mckiernan]


DOS BITCH!

so ive been sober for like a month, and last weekend i spent it high off my ass, and it felt soo good to be high, to escape reality, and just forget about all the bullshit, i came home on saturday, and sat on the floor in my room and just laughed at myself, cuz i care too much about things, and i'm just so damn stupid for caring about the little things as much as i do, thats the problem with people and all of their components, they care too much about things that are too trivial to debate on a serious level... so now i'm back to being a freak that does weird things and doesnt care about what people think of me, and i must admit, thats when i am the  happiest, freedom of will should not be comprimised, no matter how good the sex is... i dont like my clothes anymore, i want to be my dirty grungy self again, i think ill have to pull my prison shirt out of the bottom of my drawer and put it on, and wear it for the next 5 days, and see how much people like me then.. and then i'll stop talking to people all together and become a recluse, a depressed, ADHD suffering little freak crackhead on the road to being a junkie... lol, little kurt kobain wannabe is me, whatdya think, i changed in the last few months???? nah nah nah... im just a pseud(god i hope thats the right word)... but yea, im a fake, and im a suicidal idiot, i was just trying on a new suit for a little bit and testing the waters, but its cold and icy, so fuck you all


take note bitches, this is my pseudonym: [Alice Iris Azure]

uhhhh... ive been neglecting my livejournal, and i dont want it anymore, i like my blog better
www.stephkobain.blogdrive.com
god damn i wanna die, throw me in the fire and i wont throw a fit... katie come back to wallingford so we can get stoned everyday like jesus did... or else im breaking into your house

hey well its the first day of this live journal thingy, and i'm gunna keep it as a trial, see if i like it better than my crazy ass blog, which by the way is www.stephkobain.blogdrive.com , its some freaky shit, check it out, tell me which one you like more... 
back to buisness....
got in trouble today, went out partyin with katie last night, i guess i was supposed to come home and i never did, lol, so i told my parents a lie and said that i didnt come home cuz i didnt want them driving in the snow, when in reality i was way to fucked up to go home, don't ask me anything about last night cuz i cant remember, but i do remember being passed out on a couch for a lil bit.... lol, so im grounded, and i hate it, shoot me now my life sucks
